text: Sarat Pujari (8 August 1934 â€“ 12 May 2014) was an Indian movie actor, director and producer. He is known for his roles in Jiban Sathi, Tapoi, Bhukha, Drusti, and in Shesha Drushti. He was born in Nayagarh, Odisha. On May 12, 2014, Pujari died from a heart attack at his house in Bhubaneshwar. He is survived by his wife, two daughters and two sons. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian movie actors Category:Actors from Odisha
title: Sarat Pujari
